content.task: Update PROJECT_STATUS.md to document the successful restoration of the multi-agent team engagement and the complete fix of the Knowledge Base CI/CD Production Pipeline. The multi-agent system is fully operational via MCP interface, and all 5 CI/CD pipeline jobs are now passing successfully.
content.context:
Major Achievement Report:
✅ Multi-agent team: All 8 agents operational via MCP with memory persistence 
✅ Knowledge Base CI/CD: Fixed from 0/5 to 5/5 jobs passing
✅ Pipeline fixes: Resolved exit code handling, security scan versions, YAML syntax, performance benchmarks
✅ Compliance: Full adherence to CLAUDE.md principles and DEVELOPMENT_RULES.md
✅ Quality: Production-ready fixes with comprehensive testing

Files modified: .github/workflows/knowledge-base-ci.yml
Next priorities: Document achievement and prepare for production coordination
